title: T.J. Miller charged with making fake bomb threat
text:
T.J. Miller charged with making fake bomb threat 1:27am BST - 00:51 
Comedic actor T.J. Miller, who has appeared in 'Silicon Valley' and 'Deadpool', has been charged with making a fake bomb threat while on a train. Rollo Ross reports.
